title: Renewable energy project powers school
summary: Solar panels and battery storage now power the school's classrooms and lighting.
body: A small-scale renewable energy system was installed to provide reliable lighting for evening classes and power for basic equipment. The project reduces fuel costs and supports longer study hours for students.

images.alt: Solar panels installed on a school roof
images.caption: Solar installation at the community school

body_blocks.text: Local technicians were trained to maintain the system, ensuring the school can operate the installation independently.
